1.content: Generate complete project structure and backend code scaffold
1.details:
Create Node.js/Express backend with:
- REST API endpoints (network/pulse, top-meme, token details, alerts)
- PostgreSQL database schema and migrations
- Redis caching layer
- Mock data generators for Solana network and meme tokens
- Data pipeline jobs for aggregation
- Docker configuration for backend services

2.content: Generate frontend code scaffold with Solana-themed UI
2.details:
Create Next.js frontend with:
- Dashboard page with Network Pulse + Top50 Leaderboard
- Token detail pages
- Watchlist and alerts UI
- Solana-themed components (NetworkPulseChart, TopMemeTable, MemeClock, AlertPanel)
- TailwindCSS styling with specified color palette
- Chart.js/Recharts integration
- Mock API integration

3.content: Create project documentation and deployment guide
3.details:
- README with setup instructions
- Docker Compose configuration
- Environment variables documentation
- Deployment guide for Render/AWS ECS
- API documentation with example responses
- Development workflow guide
